name: AllAreGone1
uniques: Only available <when number of [Stage] is equal to [3]> <when below [1] [Troops]> <when [Pub Chess] Victory is enabled>
Unavailable <if [AllAreGone1] is constructed by anybody> <in cities with a [AllAreGone]>
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable

name: AllAreGone2
uniques: Only available <when number of [Stage] is equal to [3]> <when below [1] [Troops]> <if [AllAreGone1] is constructed by anybody> <when [Pub Chess] Victory is enabled>
Unavailable <if [AllAreGone2] is constructed by anybody> <in cities with a [AllAreGone]>
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable

name: AllAreGone3
uniques: Only available <when number of [Stage] is equal to [3]> <when below [1] [Troops]> <if [AllAreGone1] is constructed by anybody> <if [AllAreGone2] is constructed by anybody> <when [Pub Chess] Victory is enabled>

Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable

name: TheGreatestMoment1
uniques: Only available <when number of [Stage] is equal to [3]> <when [2player] Victory is enabled> <if [AllAreGone1] is constructed by anybody> <when [Pub Chess] Victory is enabled>

name: TheGreatestMoment2
uniques: Only available <when number of [Stage] is equal to [3]> <when [3player] Victory is enabled> <if [AllAreGone1] is constructed by anybody> <if [AllAreGone2] is constructed by anybody> <when [Pub Chess] Victory is enabled>

name: TheGreatestMoment3
uniques: Only available <when number of [Stage] is equal to [3]> <when [3player] Victory is enabled> <if [AllAreGone1] is constructed by anybody> <if [AllAreGone2] is constructed by anybody> <if [AllAreGone3] is constructed by anybody> <when [Pub Chess] Victory is enabled>
